title: My Whisky Barrel
description: A company specializing in renting whiskey barrel products and accessories for parties. The site includes a page detailing all products available for rent, a gallery page to view customers' setups, and a contact form.

title: Delicious Catering
description: A catering company serving the Omaha metro area. This site includes a scrolling section to display different categories of food, a gallery of past events catered, and a contact form.

title: The Gallery & Loft
description: The primary venue of Delicious Catering. This site includes a "typewriter" effect in the main heading showing different events that can be hosted at The Gallery & Loft. It also contains a map and contact form.

title: All Pro Handyman
description: A handyman business, specializing in fence and deck construction, and routine home maintenance. The site includes a content management system so the owner can add/remove different services and change copy. It features multiple pages for each service, and a contact page.

title: Amsterdam Falafel & Kabob
description: This site is a prototype for a restaurant in Omaha, featuring a dark theme, multi-step menu, about us section, and contact form.

title: My Wedding
description: A site for my wedding, with engagement photos, and countdown timer to the wedding, rsvp form, and links to registry.
